subject: Re: Speakjet Box 4 is done.
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Rob,

Awesome!!!  That was really fast and i definitely appreciate your 
charitable donation to my research.  Chatty is always good, they always 
seem to have something to tell me.  Look forward to posting a bunch of 
files and taking it on a couple road trips i have coming up.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dead.science" <dead.science@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Steve:
> Your box is all done!!!!!
> I will test it for a day or two and get it out to you.  Hope you post
> lots of files for all of us here.  This box seems to be very "chatty"
> for some reason.  And thats good.
> Rob
> Deadscience.com
>
